A '''polished granite slab''' is a [[polished granite]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Polished granite slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row

== Usage ==
{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all slabs|Slab#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Polished granite slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
